channel.title: Cannot open encrypted volumes from Thunar in Whonix
channel.description: Hello. My problem is the following: when I use USB devices in Whonix to transfer files, I cannot open an encrypted volume (LUKS) in Thunar. After installation of gvfs in Workstation, the encrypted volumes become avaliable in Thunar left menu but when I click on an encrypted volume and type a passphrase, nothing happens. So I need to manually use "cryptsetup luksOpen" and then mount mapped device to /media folder. Is there a solution to unlock encrypted volumes in a GUI way?
